title: Easy Pineapple Cheesecake
ingredients: 1/2 cup SPLENDA® No Calorie Sweetener, Granulated
instructions:
In a large bowl, mix cream cheese and SPLENDA(R) Granulated Sweetener together. Stir in 1 can of pineapple and whipped topping to cream cheese mixture. Mix until smooth.
Pour mixture into crust and top with other can of pineapple. Cover and chill for 2 hours.
